description:
The current season of "Raising Hope" will be its last one, FOX announced. The network says the comedy will bow out with a one-hour series finale on April 4.现在正在播出的《家有喜旺》第四季将会是该剧的最后一季了。FOX宣布，砍掉这部正喜剧，并且将在4月4日播出的最后一集制作成1小时的特别集。

That's fairly short notice, but executive producer Mike Mariano says he and the cast and crew planned the season finale as a possible series ender. 这部剧的生命是有些短，不过该剧的执行制片人Mike Mariano表示，他和剧组的工作人员在拍摄过程中也感觉到这一季可能会是这部剧的最后一季了。

"On behalf of myself, [creator] Greg Garcia and 'Raising Hope's' amazing cast and crew, I would like to thank our audience for tuning in and supporting us over the last four seasons," Mariano says in a statement. "We planned our Season 4 finale with this possibility in mind, and hope our loyal fans enjoy the way we've chosen to say goodbye to the Chances and to Natesville. Thanks again."”我仅代表我自己、（制片人）Greg Garcia和《家有喜旺》所有出色的演员和工作人员向4年来支持我们的观众朋友们表示衷心的感谢，“Mariano在声明中说。“我们在制作第四季的时候心里就有底了，这可能会是最后一季，希望我们所有忠实的观众们会喜欢我们大结局里选择的和大家告别的方式。再次感谢大家。”

While "Hope's" cancellation is a bummer for fans, it's not exactly a surprise. The show's ratings have tumbled this season with a move to Friday nights -- it's averaging just 2.8 million viewers and a 1.0 rating among adults 18-49 for the season.《家有喜旺》被砍对于观众们来说不算是个意外。这部剧本季开始背调档到了每周五晚播出，收视也颇为惨淡——本季的平均收看人数只有280万，18-49岁收视人群的收视率只有1.0。
